Best Internet Deals for New Tenants in Addis

Getting reliable internet service is essential for new tenants in Addis Ababa. With multiple providers offering various packages, speeds, and pricing options, choosing the right internet service can be overwhelming. This comprehensive guide will help you find the best internet deals that suit your needs and budget, ensuring you stay connected in your new home.

Top Internet Providers in Addis Ababa

1. Ethio Telecom (Main Provider)

Coverage: Nationwide, excellent in Addis Ababa

Connection Types: Fiber, ADSL, Mobile data

Installation: Professional installation included

Customer Service: 24/7 support available

Reliability: High reliability, minimal downtime

2. Safaricom Ethiopia

Coverage: Growing network in Addis Ababa

Connection Types: Mobile data, Home internet

Installation: Quick setup, self-installation options

Customer Service: Good customer support

Reliability: Good reliability, expanding coverage

3. Local Internet Service Providers

Coverage: Specific areas in Addis Ababa

Connection Types: Wireless, Fiber (limited areas)

Installation: Local installation teams

Customer Service: Local support, personal service

Reliability: Varies by provider and location

Internet Package Options

Basic Packages (Light Usage)

Speed: 5-10 Mbps

Data Allowance: 50-100 GB per month

Price Range: 800-1,500 ETB per month

Best For: Light browsing, email, social media

Users: 1-2 people

Activities: Web browsing, email, social media, light streaming

Standard Packages (Moderate Usage)

Speed: 15-25 Mbps

Data Allowance: 150-300 GB per month

Price Range: 1,500-3,000 ETB per month

Best For: Regular internet use, streaming, video calls

Users: 2-4 people

Activities: Streaming, video calls, online gaming, work from home

Premium Packages (Heavy Usage)

Speed: 30-50 Mbps

Data Allowance: 500+ GB per month

Price Range: 3,000-6,000 ETB per month

Best For: Heavy streaming, gaming, multiple users

Users: 4+ people

Activities: 4K streaming, online gaming, video conferencing, large downloads

Business Packages (Professional Use)

Speed: 50-100 Mbps

Data Allowance: Unlimited or very high limits

Price Range: 5,000-15,000 ETB per month

Best For: Business use, professional work

Users: Multiple users, business operations

Activities: Business applications, video conferencing, cloud services

Best Deals for New Tenants

New Customer Promotions

Installation Discounts:

  • Free installation: Usually 2,000-5,000 ETB value
  • 50% off installation: 1,000-2,500 ETB savings
  • Waived setup fees: 500-1,500 ETB savings
  • Equipment discounts: Router/modem discounts

First Month Deals:

  • First month free: Save 800-6,000 ETB
  • 50% off first 3 months: Significant savings
  • Upgrade bonuses: Free speed upgrades
  • Bundle discounts: Internet + phone packages

Long-term Contracts

12-Month Contracts:

  • Discount: 10-20% off monthly fees
  • Free months: 1-2 free months
  • Equipment included: Free router/modem
  • Priority support: Faster customer service

24-Month Contracts:

  • Discount: 20-30% off monthly fees
  • Free months: 2-3 free months
  • Premium equipment: High-end routers
  • Guaranteed speeds: Speed guarantees

Area-Specific Internet Options

CMC Area

Best Providers: Ethio Telecom, Local providers

Available Speeds: 5-100 Mbps

Price Range: 1,000-8,000 ETB per month

Installation: 1-3 days

Reliability: High

Bole Area

Best Providers: Ethio Telecom, Safaricom

Available Speeds: 10-100 Mbps

Price Range: 1,200-10,000 ETB per month

Installation: 1-2 days

Reliability: Very high

Piassa Area

Best Providers: Ethio Telecom, Local providers

Available Speeds: 5-50 Mbps

Price Range: 800-5,000 ETB per month

Installation: 2-5 days

Reliability: Good

Ayat Area

Best Providers: Ethio Telecom, Local providers

Available Speeds: 10-100 Mbps

Price Range: 1,000-8,000 ETB per month

Installation: 1-3 days

Reliability: High

Cost Comparison

Monthly Costs by Speed

5-10 Mbps:

  • Basic package: 800-1,500 ETB
  • Data limit: 50-100 GB
  • Best for: Light usage

15-25 Mbps:

  • Standard package: 1,500-3,000 ETB
  • Data limit: 150-300 GB
  • Best for: Moderate usage

30-50 Mbps:

  • Premium package: 3,000-6,000 ETB
  • Data limit: 500+ GB
  • Best for: Heavy usage

Additional Costs

Installation Fees:

  • Standard installation: 2,000-5,000 ETB
  • Premium installation: 5,000-10,000 ETB
  • Emergency installation: 3,000-7,000 ETB
  • Weekend installation: 2,500-6,000 ETB

Equipment Costs:

  • Basic router: 1,500-3,000 ETB
  • Premium router: 3,000-8,000 ETB
  • WiFi extender: 2,000-5,000 ETB
  • Ethernet cables: 200-500 ETB

Tips for Getting the Best Deals

Negotiation Strategies

Compare Multiple Providers:

  • Get quotes: From at least 3 providers
  • Compare packages: Speed, data, price
  • Ask for discounts: New customer promotions
  • Negotiate terms: Contract length, pricing

Timing Your Sign-up:

  • End of month: Sales targets, better deals
  • Holiday periods: Special promotions
  • New year: New customer incentives
  • Competition periods: Provider competition

Bundle Options

Internet + Mobile:

  • Savings: 10-20% on total bill
  • Shared data: Combined data allowance
  • Single bill: Easier management
  • Family plans: Multiple lines

Internet + TV:

  • Savings: 15-25% on total bill
  • Entertainment package: TV + internet
  • Premium channels: Additional content
  • Streaming services: Included subscriptions

Installation Process

Pre-Installation Requirements

Documentation:

  • ID copy: Valid identification
  • Address proof: Rental agreement, utility bill
  • Payment method: Bank account, credit card
  • Contact information: Phone number, email

Technical Requirements:

  • Phone line: For ADSL connections
  • Power outlet: For router/modem
  • Access point: For installation team
  • Building permission: For fiber installation

Installation Timeline

Standard Installation:

  • Booking: 1-3 days in advance
  • Installation time: 2-4 hours
  • Testing: 30 minutes
  • Activation: Immediate to 24 hours

Express Installation:

  • Booking: Same day or next day
  • Installation time: 1-2 hours
  • Testing: 15 minutes
  • Activation: Immediate

Conclusion

Finding the best internet deals for new tenants in Addis Ababa requires research, comparison, and negotiation. By understanding the available options, comparing packages, and taking advantage of new customer promotions, you can secure reliable internet service that meets your needs and budget. Remember to consider your usage patterns, the number of users, and your location when choosing a provider and package. With the right internet service, you'll stay connected and productive in your new home in Addis Ababa.

ለአዲስ አሻሚዎች በአዲስ አበባ የተሻሉ የኢንተርኔት ተግባሮች

በአዲስ አበባ አዲስ አሻሚዎች ለማግኘት አስተማማኝ የኢንተርኔት አገልግሎት አስፈላጊ ነው። በተለያዩ ጥቅሎች፣ ፍጥነቶች እና የዋጋ አማራጮች የሚሰጡ በርካታ አቅራቢዎች ከመኖራቸው፣ ትክክለኛውን የኢንተርኔት አገልግሎት መምረጥ አስቸጋሪ ሊሆን ይችላል። ይህ ሁለገብ መምሪያ የእርስዎን ፍላጎቶች እና የጀርባ የሚስማማ የተሻሉ የኢንተርኔት ተግባሮችን ለማግኘት ያግዛችኋል።
